security_audit.summary: This is a pure documentation skill containing only a SKILL.md file. No executable code, scripts, network operations, file system access beyond documented process, environment variable access, or external commands. Safe for publication.

content.user_title: Generate Quality Report for Chapter Deployment
content.value_statement: Manual quality review takes hours and risks missing critical issues. This skill aggregates all validation results, calculates quality metrics, and produces deployment-ready reports automatically.
actual_capabilities: Aggregate validation results from structure and semantic gates
Calculate quality scores with weighted scoring algorithm
Create machine-readable JSON metrics for CI/CD pipelines
Timestamp reports for audit trail and compliance
limitations: Does not perform validation itself - requires input from previous gates
Does not execute Python scripts - describes usage only
Does not access external APIs or services
Does not modify source files - only generates output reports

prompt_templates.title: Basic report

prompt_templates.title: With thresholds

prompt_templates.title: Full pipeline
prompt_templates.prompt: Run complete quality gate: aggregate all validation artifacts, calculate metrics, generate CHAPTER_05_VERIFICATION.md and quality_metrics.json

prompt_templates.title: Automated decision
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate quality report for automated deployment decision. Output only JSON metrics and pass/fail status for pipeline integration

best_practices: Run quality-report-generate after all validation gates have completed
Review markdown report before deployment for human context
Use JSON metrics for automated CI/CD quality gates
Archive both report formats for compliance audit trail
anti_patterns: Running quality-report-generate before validation gates complete
Ignoring warnings in the quality report
Skipping manual review for high-stakes content
Deleting validation artifacts before report generation

faq.question: What tools support this skill?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. It is documentation-only and does not execute code.

faq.question: What quality thresholds are used?
faq.answer: Default thresholds are 85 for overall score, 100 for structure, 90 for semantic, and 85 for visual accuracy.

faq.question: Can this skill integrate with CI/CD?
faq.answer: Yes. The JSON output format is designed for automated parsing and quality gate decisions in pipelines.

faq.question: Is my data safe with this skill?
faq.answer: This is a documentation-only skill. It describes how to generate reports but does not access or transmit any data.

faq.question: Why is my quality score low?
faq.answer: Low scores typically result from structure errors, missing semantic classes, or incomplete content. Review the markdown report for specific issues.

faq.question: How is this different from other validation skills?
faq.answer: Quality-report-generate is the final step that aggregates all validation results into comprehensive reports for deployment decisions.
